title: Ninja Batman x Poputepipikku Kindan no Collab CM

synonyms: Ninja Batman x Pop Team Epic Kindan no Collab CM Eizou Kaikin!
alternative_titles.ja: 『ニンジャバットマン』×『ポプテピピック』禁断のコラボCM

synopsis: At Anime Japan 2018, Warner Bros. announced a collaboration between Ninja Batman and Poputepipikku. PVC figurines will be sold of the collaboration and a commercial was aired at the convention's booth, on television, and posted online--where Popuko and Pipimi dress as Batman and Joker respectively in order to promote the Ninja Batman's theatrical release.
